const int NCLIMIT = 100;
double ncr[NCLIMIT][NCLIMIT];

void fillncr()
{

  for(int i=0; i<NCLIMIT; i++)
    for(int j=0; j<NCLIMIT; j++)  {
      if(i<j)
        ncr[i][j] = 0;
      else if(j==0)
        ncr[i][j] = 1;
      else
        ncr[i][j] = (ncr[i-1][j] + ncr[i-1][j-1]);
    }
}


double dp[65][65];
double p;

double val(int m,int n)
{
  if(m == 0)
    return m;
  if(n == 0)
    return 1;
  if(dp[m][n] > -1e-9)
    return dp[m][n];
  int tot = n+m;
  double ans = 0,den = 0;
  rep(i,tot/2+1)
  {
    if(min(tot/2-i,-tot/2+n+i) < 0)
      continue;
    double pb = ncr[m][i]*ncr[n][tot/2-i];
    if(pb < 1e-9)
      continue;

    den += pb;
    ans += val(i,tot/2-i)*val(m-i,-tot/2+n+i)*pb;
    ans += val(i,tot/2-i)*(1-val(m-i,-tot/2+n+i))*p*pb;
    ans += (1-val(i,tot/2-i))*val(m-i,-tot/2+n+i)*p*pb;
  }
  ans /= den;
  return dp[m][n] = ans;
}

void fn()
{
  int n,m;
  cin>>n>>m>>p;
  rep(i,65)
    rep(j,65)
      dp[i][j] = -1;
  cout<<fixed<<setprecision(10)<<val(m,n)<<"\n";
}

int main()
{   
  ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  cin.tie(0);
  fillncr();
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  rep(i,t)
    fn();
  return 0;
}
